_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Eight qualities of females who are rebor: Given by parents to a husband wanting what’s best for her
Gets up before him and goes to bed after him
Obliging, behaves nicely, and speaks politely
Lives at home rid of the stain of stinginess
Never looks down on her husband
Never scolds her husband with jealous words
Gets up early, works tirelessly, and manages the domestic help
Duties of a lady who is reborn among the: Fulfills these duties according to her husband’s desire
